Intervention: Injection of 2.5 milligrams of indocyanin green and 20 MBq of technetium 99 prior to breast surgery
Indocyanin green: one injection, 2.5 milligrams per patient, intradermal use
20 MBq intradermal injection of technetium 99 before breast surgery
Eligibility: A breast cancer infiltrated by histology (inductive carcinoma, lobular...) or an in-situ carcinoma with a high risk of micro-invasion. (High level with necrosis, radiologically estimated size more than 40mm, or immediate mastectomy...)
Unifocal or multifocal but in the same quarter
Size < 5 cm clinically palpable or not
Informed consent signed by a patient or a legally responsible authority
Patient enrolled in a social security system
Results: Number of patients with less than two lymph nodes detected
Number of patients with less than two lymph nodes detected by indocyanin (ICG) + isotope detection only
Title of arm/group: Double detection Indocyanin + Isotope
Description of the arm/group: 2.5 milligram intradermal injection of indocyanin green and 20 MBq of technetium 99 prior to breast surgery
Indocyanin green: one injection, 2.5 milligrams per patient, intradermal use
Type of measure: Number of participants
Title of the arm/group: Isotope detection alone
Description of the arm/group: 20 MBq intradermal injection of technetium 99 prior to breast surgery
Type of measure: Number of participants
